costs.name: On Demand 5 + Charges
costs.description: On Demand 5 per deployment, 50 per core, 10 per GB ram and 1 per GB disk

manifest.manifest_content:
version: '2.1'
services:
    ems:
        depends_on:
            - elasticsearch
        image: elastest/ems

    elasticsearch:
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:5.4.0
        environment:
            - http.host=0.0.0.0
            - transport.host=127.0.0.1

ems.description: Service for managing monitoring machines and subscribers

BeatsFeed.description: this endpoint receives events sent by beats (elasticsearch data shippers)
